short_summary: Request for Proposal for Spare Parts
description: This amendment to the request for proposal for the acquisition of spare parts, requests that the delivery be made: Department of National Defence 25 CFSD Montreal, Department of National Defence 7 CF Supply Depot.
tags: Regional and International External Promo and innovation Design./Finance Development
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Spare Parts

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Department of National Defence has issued a requirement for spare parts as outlined below. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the goods to the following locations:

* Department of National Defence 25 CFSD Montreal
	+ Address: 6363 Notre Dame St. E.
	+ City: Montreal
	+ Province: Quebec
	+ Postal Code: H1N 1V9
* Department of National Defence 7 CF Supply Depot
	+ Address: 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236
	+ City: Edmonton
	+ Province: Alberta
	+ Postal Code: T5J 4J5

The delivery deadline is February 29, 2024. For more details on the items required, please refer to Annex A Requirement & Price in the Request For Proposal (RFP).

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: W8486-249384/A
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: October 16, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 27, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: February 29, 2024
* Tender Status: Expiration

## Procurement Category and Method

* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Selection Criteria

* There are no selection criteria specified for this tender.

## Trade Agreements

* This procurement is subject to trade agreements. Please refer to the tender description or tender documents for details.

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR) and Alberta

## Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of National Defence
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Drive
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: Ontario
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0K2
	+ Country: Canada

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Alexander Reynolds
* Contact Email: alexander.reynolds@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (000) 000-0000

## Tender Attachments

* Tender Notice and Attachments are available on CanadaBuys: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/ [1](https://canadab
